product.name: 48" Ceiling Mount Pull Up Bar, Heavy Duty Multi-Grip Rafter Chin Up Bar for Garage/Basement/Backyard Ceiling Beam, Adjustable Height&Supports to 650 Lbs
product.description:
HWOOUSA's mission is to make fitness accessible to everyone, allowing users to experience the full range of fitness benefits from the comfort of their own home.
HWOOUSA was originally formed by a small team of designers and engineers. They are constantly researching and testing different materials, designs and features, and with a focus on quality and customer experience from the very beginning of product design, they have developed a range of fitness equipment that meets the needs of fitness enthusiasts.
48" Ceiling Pull Up Bar
Ceiling Mount Pull Up Bar
48"Heavy Duty Pull-Up Bar
Wall Mounted Pull Up Bar
36" Pull Up Bar Wall
48"Multi Grip PullUp Bar
48" Ceiling Pull Up Bar
product.bullet_points:
• 【650LBS Heavy Duty Steel Frame】 — Engineered with industrial-grade steel and reinforced joints, our ceiling mounted pull up bar withstands 650 lbs for ultra-secure strength training. The powder-coated anti-rust surface ensures longevity in garage/home gyms or outdoor setups
• 【Multiple Grips + Include 2 Round Anchors Design】 — Maximize muscle activation with wide/narrow/neutral grips, Includes 2 heavy-duty ROUND ANCHORS for TRX straps, resistance bands, or suspension training - perfect for cross-training versatility
• 【Perfect for 16“ and 24” ceiling joists】 —Precision 48" on-center mount holes perfectly span 16" and 24" ceiling joists, 1.26" diameter steel bar with hammer tone finish for a secure comfortable grip
• 【5 Height Adjustments & Dual Mounting】 — Configure your chin up bar from 21.8" to 29.8" ceiling clearance with tool-free height slots. Includes expansion bolts for concrete and self-tapping screws for wood joists - transforms garage rafters into a professional training zone in 15 mins
• 【Space-Saving Overhead Design】 — Unlike bulky racks, our low-profile pull up bar mounts flush to ceilings/walls. Detach support arms instantly for storage. Ideal for small home gyms, apartments, or backyard workout stations
• 【SATISFACTION GUARANTEE】 — At HWOOUSA, we are confident that you will love our garage pull up bar. But if you are not satisfied for any reason, you can return it within 90 days for a replacement. We also offer a 2-year protection plan for extra peace of mind
